ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The publication of this article was funded by the Open Access Fund of the Leibniz Universität Hannover. We thank Angie Faust for language corrections and Thomas Beuster (ÖSSM - Ecological protection station Steinhuder Meer) for the opportunity to take aerial photography in the study site and for his helpful contributions to the ecology of blueberries in the Lichtenmoor.
